description: The loyal general of the Watatsumi Army, Gorou is a Geo bow user who excels at buffing and supporting Geo teammates.

artifacts.name: Husk of Opulent Dreams (2) + Emblem of Severed Fate (2)

info: Gorou is a top-tier Geo support and buffer, especially for teams with multiple Geo characters. Build him for Energy Recharge and DEF% to maximize his buffs.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Ripping Fang Fletching
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow.
Charged Attack
Performs a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. A fully charged shot deals Geo DMG.
Plunging Attack
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Inuzaka All-Round Defense
skills.desc: Gorou deals AoE Geo DMG and sets up a General's War Banner, providing buffs to DEF and Geo DMG based on the number of Geo characters in the party.
skills.details_html:
Inuzaka All-Round Defense
Deals AoE Geo DMG and sets up a General's War Banner, providing buffs to DEF and Geo DMG based on the number of Geo characters in the party.

skills.name: Juuga: Forward Unto Victory
skills.desc: Gorou deals AoE Geo DMG and creates a field that provides continuous buffs to DEF, Geo DMG, and interruption resistance to party members.
skills.details_html:
Juuga: Forward Unto Victory
Deals AoE Geo DMG and creates a field that provides continuous buffs to DEF, Geo DMG, and interruption resistance to party members. Buffs scale with the number of Geo characters in the party.

passive_talents.name: Heedless of the Wind and Weather
passive_talents.desc: After using Inuzaka All-Round Defense or Juuga: Forward Unto Victory, DEF of all party members is increased by 25% for 12s.

passive_talents.name: A Favor Repaid
passive_talents.desc: Gorou's skill and burst grant healing to active characters based on his DEF.

passive_talents.name: Seeker of Shinies
passive_talents.desc: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Inazuma on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Rushing Hound: Swift as the Wind
constellations.desc: After using Inuzaka All-Round Defense, ATK is increased by 10% for 12s.

constellations.name: Sitting Hound: Steady as a Clock
constellations.desc: General's War Banner grants 15% Geo DMG Bonus to all party members.

constellations.name: Mauling Hound: Fierce as Fire
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Inuzaka All-Round Defense by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lapping Hound: Warm as Water
constellations.desc: When General's War Banner is on the field, active characters gain 20% increased healing received.

constellations.name: Striking Hound: Thunderous Force
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Juuga: Forward Unto Victory by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Valiant Hound: Mountainous Fealty
constellations.desc: When a character is healed by Gorou, their CRIT DMG is increased by 20% for 10s.
